TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the default binding property for a component. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute is specified at the class level. It can be inherited and does not allow multiple attributes on the same class.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](../Topic/Extending%20Metadata%20Using%20Attributes.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute class to specify the default property for data binding. For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](../Topic/How%20to:%20Apply%20Attributes%20in%20Windows%20Forms%20Controls.md).
[!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AttributesDemoControl#20](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.componentmodel._92_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.ComponentModel.AttributesDemoControl#20](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.componentmodel._92_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using no parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Name%2A> property to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the default binding property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified property name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Name%2A> property to the value of the `name` parameter.

Docs.summary: Represents the default value for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Default member is a static, read-only field that defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute> class initialized with the default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current instance
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current instance.
Docs.returns: if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, , indicating they are not equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Equals method returns `true` if the value of the `obj` parameter is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Name%2A> properties of the two objects are equal.

Docs.value: if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, , indicating they are not equal.

Gets the name of the default binding property for the component to which the is bound.
Docs.value: The name of the default binding property for the component to which the is bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Name property is set in the constructor.
